privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

footer.title: Questions About Your Privacy?
footer.description: We're here to help. Contact our privacy team if you have any questions or concerns about how we handle your personal data.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Rentify ("we", "our", or "us") provides a SaaS platform that helps car-rental companies in Morocco manage reservations, fleets, customers, staff, invoices, maintenance, GPS tracking, and related operations. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting the personal data you share with us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our services.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.intro: When using Rentify, we may collect the following categories of information:

customerInfo.title: Customer and User Information
customerInfo.fullName: Full name, phone number, email, address
customerInfo.contact: Phone number, email address, physical address
customerInfo.identification: Identification documents and numbers (CIN, passport, driving license)
customerInfo.dateOfBirth: Date of birth and agency association

gpsInfo.title: GPS and Vehicle Data
gpsInfo.identifiers: GPS device identifiers and location records of vehicles

securityInfo.title: Security and Blacklist Information
securityInfo.blacklist: Blacklist entries (name, ID, license, reason, reporting agency)
securityInfo.authentication: Login and authentication data (email, hashed passwords, tokens)

aiDocumentScanning.title: Use of AI (Gemini) for Identity Document Scanning
aiDocumentScanning.intro: We use the Gemini AI API (a third-party AI service) to help automatically extract identity information from images of national IDs, passports, and driving licences that you upload when adding a new customer. This section explains what that means for your privacy:

whatWeSend.title: What we send to Gemini
whatWeSend.images: Images of identity documents (photo scans or photos you upload)
whatWeSend.metadata: Minimal contextual metadata needed for processing (e.g., request ID, timestamp)

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.extraction: To automatically extract structured identity fields (full name, ID number, date of birth, etc.) to speed up customer creation and reduce manual entry errors
purpose.qualityCheck: To detect image quality issues (blurriness, missing corners) and request a retake if needed

legalBasis.title: Legal basis and consent
legalBasis.content: We process identity images on the basis of your explicit consent and to perform the service (contractual necessity) for customer onboarding. We request and record this consent before sending any ID images to Gemini. You can refuse; in that case customer creation must be done manually.

thirdPartyHandling.title: Data handling by third party (Gemini)
thirdPartyHandling.content: Gemini is a third-party processor. We only share data that is necessary for the extraction task. You should be aware that third-party processing is governed by their terms and security practices. We require processors to follow industry-standard security measures and to process data only on our behalf.

retention.title: Retention & deletion
retention.content: Extracted identity data is stored in Rentify until you request deletion or until retention periods mandated by law expire. Uploaded identity images are retained only as long as necessary to perform verification and for legal/compliance purposes; retention durations are documented and can be provided on request. If you request deletion, we will also attempt to remove stored images and request deletion from Gemini where their API and terms permit.

minimization.title: Minimization & accuracy
minimization.content: We only extract and store fields necessary for onboarding and compliance (name, ID number, DOB, license number), and we do not keep unnecessary copies of document images longer than required. We provide a manual review option if automated extraction appears incorrect.

profiling.title: Profiling & automated decision-making
profiling.content: The Gemini extraction is used solely to parse and extract document data. We do not use it for profiling or automated decisions that have legal or similarly significant effects on individuals.

security.title: Security
security.content: Data transmitted to Gemini is encrypted in transit. We store tokens and authentication credentials securely, and access is restricted to authorized personnel and systems only. We use standard measures (encryption at rest, role-based access control, logging).

howWeUseYourInfo.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseYourInfo.provideServices: Provide and improve Rentify services (reservations, billing, GPS tracking, customer records)
howWeUseYourInfo.extractIdentity: Extract identity data (with your consent) to create customer profiles and speed onboarding
howWeUseYourInfo.authenticate: Authenticate users, prevent fraud, and comply with legal obligations
howWeUseYourInfo.support: Provide customer support and internal reporting

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell personal data. We may share data with:
dataSharing.agencies: The rental agencies you manage through Rentify
dataSharing.serviceProviders: Service providers (payment processors, hosting, Gemini AI) who act as processors
dataSharing.authorities: Moroccan authorities when required by law (fraud, subpoenas)
dataSharing.investigations: In safety or legal investigations where necessary

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content: We store data in secure systems and apply reasonable technical and organizational security measures (encryption, access controls, token refresh mechanisms). Data may be stored in Morocco or in other jurisdictions depending on hosting and service providers. We aim to select processors that meet strong security standards.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain personal data only as long as needed to provide services, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements. Specific retention periods (e.g., invoices, blacklist records) are available on request.

yourRights.title: Your Rights (Under Moroccan law — Law 09-08)
yourRights.access: Access the personal data we hold about you
yourRights.deletion: Request deletion of your personal data, subject to legal retention requirements
yourRights.contact: To exercise rights, contact: privacy@rentify.ma. We will respond within a reasonable timeframe.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies for session management, analytics, and UX improvements. You can control cookie settings in your browser.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: Third-party services (e.g., Gemini AI, payment gateways, GPS vendors) have their own privacy policies. We only share necessary data and require processors to protect it.

children.title: Children
children.content: Our service is not directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy. We will publish changes on our website and indicate the effective date.

consentCheckbox.title: Consent Checkbox for Customer Creation
consentCheckbox.intro: When creating a new customer with ID document scanning, the following consent text should be displayed:
consentCheckbox.text: I consent to Rentify sending images of the identity document I upload to a third-party AI service (Gemini) to automatically extract identity information. I confirm I am authorized to provide this document and understand my rights to access, correct, and delete this data.

acceptance.intro: By accessing or using Rentify ("the Service"), you ("User," "Agency," or "Customer") agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, you must not use the Service.

description.intro: Rentify provides a cloud-based platform for car rental agencies in Morocco to manage their operations, including:

features.reservations: Vehicle reservations, fleet management, and maintenance tracking
features.onboarding: Customer onboarding and verification (including AI-based ID scanning)
features.gpsManagement: GPS device management and real-time vehicle tracking
features.fraud: Fraud prevention tools such as customer blacklists

registration.title: Registration
registration.content: To use Rentify, you must create an account with accurate and complete information.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.content: Accounts are protected by login credentials and tokens. You are responsible for maintaining their confidentiality.

roles.title: Roles
roles.content: Access rights are role-based (e.g., Admin, Manager, Staff, Customer). Agencies are responsible for assigning and monitoring roles.

sharing.title: Prohibited Sharing
sharing.content: You may not share your credentials or allow unauthorized access.

prohibitions.unlawful: Use the Service for unlawful or fraudulent activities
prohibitions.bypass: Attempt to bypass authentication or security measures
prohibitions.malicious: Upload malicious files or interfere with system operations
prohibitions.blacklist: Misuse the blacklist system by adding false or defamatory entries
prohibitions.tracking: Track vehicles or individuals without proper legal basis and consent

identityVerification.integration: Rentify integrates with Gemini AI API to process images of IDs (CIN, passport, driving licence) for customer onboarding.
identityVerification.consent: By uploading an identity document, you consent to automated data extraction and agree that we may process this data as described in the Privacy Policy.
identityVerification.alternatives: Rentify provides manual alternatives if you do not consent to automated processing.

gpsTracking.connection: Agencies may connect GPS devices to track vehicle location.
gpsTracking.compliance: Use of GPS data must comply with Moroccan laws regarding privacy and consent. Agencies are responsible for informing drivers and customers when vehicles are being tracked.

dataPrivacy.processing: We process data according to our Privacy Policy and Moroccan Law 09-08 on personal data protection.
dataPrivacy.controllers: Agencies using Rentify are considered "data controllers" for their customers' information.
dataPrivacy.processor: Rentify acts as a "data processor," providing tools for secure storage, invoicing, and fraud prevention.

payments.generation: Rentify may generate and store invoices and payment records.
payments.compliance: Agencies are responsible for ensuring compliance with Moroccan tax and invoicing regulations.
payments.guarantor: Rentify does not act as a payment guarantor.

intellectualProperty.protection: Rentify software, logos, and branding are protected by intellectual property rights.
intellectualProperty.prohibition: You may not copy, distribute, or reverse-engineer any part of the Service.

suspension.intro: We may suspend or terminate accounts if:

reasons.misuse: You misuse the system (fraud, unauthorized access, unlawful use)
reasons.legal: Required by Moroccan authorities or legal obligations

suspension.agencies: Agencies may also suspend their staff accounts at any time.

liability.asIs: Rentify provides the Service "as is" and does not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free operation.

notLiableFor.title: We are not liable for:
notLiableFor.technical: Losses due to GPS inaccuracies, network outages, or AI extraction errors
notLiableFor.actions: Fraudulent or unlawful actions taken by agencies or their staff
notLiableFor.damages: Any damages beyond what is required under Moroccan law

changes.modification: We may modify these Terms at any time. Updates will be published on our website.
changes.acceptance: Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

governingLaw.moroccanLaw: These Terms are governed by Moroccan law.
governingLaw.jurisdiction: Any disputes shall be resolved by competent Moroccan courts.
